title: Secondary Social Studies Teacher Professional Development Through Observation-Based Reflective Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Secondary Education Curriculum and Over One Year of Classroom Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based simple video recording and sharing environment, focusing on reflective discussions after observing field classes

learning_goals: Participants can derive at least three frameworks for analyzing educational interactions through observations of actual secondary social studies classes.
Based on observational cases, learners can propose two specific improvement plans for collaborative instructional design.
Students can write at least one improvement plan for instructional strategies in their reflective journal, incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
